br.uff.tempo.middleware
Class SmartAndroid

java.lang.Object
  br.uff.tempo.middleware.SmartAndroid

public class SmartAndroid
extends java.lang.Object

Source Class where SmartServer is defined in terms of communication address. The SmartServer is composed of services: Resource Discovery (RDS), Resource Register (RRS) and Resource Localization (RLS); and a Resource Repository.

Method Summary
static void fillLocalIpAddress()
          Set local ip address in order to verify if itself is as SmartServer
static void fillLocalPrefixAddress()
          Set local Prefix in order to verify if itself is as SmartServer
static java.lang.String getLocalIpAddress()
          Get device local address
static java.lang.String getLocalIpAddressForRds()
          Utility function for get local ip address to be used as SmartServer Address ex: resourceDiscoveryIP = getLocalIpAddressForRds(); This function differ from getLocalIpAddres, because this function get right address before execution of fillLocalIpAddress
static int getLocalPrefix()
          Get device local prefix
static void newInstance()
          Following Sigleton Design Patter it is the constructor that initialize the SmartServer

getLocalIpAddressForRds

public static java.lang.String getLocalIpAddressForRds()
Utility function for get local ip address to be used as SmartServer Address ex: resourceDiscoveryIP = getLocalIpAddressForRds(); This function differ from getLocalIpAddres, because this function get right address before execution of fillLocalIpAddress
